description:
UNEP-WCMC (1999). Global distribution of sea turtle feeding sites (ver. 1.1). Cambridge (UK): UNEP World Conservation Monitoring Centre. URL: http://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/21

This dataset shows the known locations of sea turtle feeding sites, for five of the seven species: hawksbill turtle (Eretmochelys imbricata), leatherback turtle (Dermochelys coriacea), green turtle (Chelonia mydas), loggerhead turtle (Caretta caretta), and olive ridley turtle (Lepidochelys olivacea).
keywords: _14_001_wcmc006_turtlefeeding1999_v1_1, coastal, features, feeding, habitat, IUCN, marine, threatened, turtle, UNEP-WCMC
name: TV_Global Distribution of Sea Turtle Feeding Sites (1999)
